Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie centers around Miyazawa’s life beginning at age 9 and carries forward to his death during World War II at age 38. It shows how his family driven him to struggle against society while also showing his efforts to help suffering farmers through youth activism.
